definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: What is the greatest change that has taken place in the family?
sentences.chinese: 预读选项可知此题考查的是哪个方面所发生的变化。

sentences.english: The distribution of different yellow greenish spore balls of false smut on single panicle was observed.
sentences.chinese: 考查了稻曲病不同曲果数在单穗上的分布。

sentences.english: The revelation of the American education policy-"the new economy"to our country;
sentences.chinese: 本文对中国教育政策传播模式变化进行了考查。

sentences.english: The reliabilities and validities of the MHSI-C were examined using Pearson's correlations and factor analysis.
sentences.chinese: 用相关分析和因素分析考查量表的信度和效度。

sentences.english: The second part goes on to question and examine whether this tiger is ever in existence.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分追问和考查老虎是否确然存在。

sentences.english: The property of egg-laying for quails was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 同时考查了高碘蛋生产阶段鹑的生产性能。

sentences.english: First of all, examine what is wrong with your current situation.
sentences.chinese: 首先，认真考查自己的现实处境出了什么问题。

sentences.english: None of these explanations can stand up under close examination.
sentences.chinese: 这些解释没有一个能经得住严格的考查。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the quality of hydroxycamptothecine preparations manufactured by different companies.
sentences.chinese: 目的考查国内不同企业羟基喜树碱制剂的产品质量。

sentences.english: Staffordshire University makes a distinction between "Formative Assessment" and "Summative Assessment. "
sentences.chinese: 斯泰福厦大学将“考查”与“考试”明显的区分开来。

sentences.english: Now she's seeing a "non-diagnosed" lawyer who knows all about her illness.
sentences.chinese: 现在她正在考查一名健康的知道她所有问题的律师。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Study the influence of phosphonomycin on cisplatin renal toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 目的考查磷霉素对顺铂肾毒性的影响。

sentences.english: The reliabilities and validities of the MHS-C were examined using Pearson's correlations and factor analysis.
sentences.chinese: 用相关分析和因素分析考查量表的信度和效度。

sentences.english: This does not usually count towards your final grade.
sentences.chinese: 考查通常不会计算在最终成绩中。

sentences.english: The property of egg - laying chicken was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 同时考查了高碘蛋生产阶段乌骨鸡的生产性能。

definition: the subject under discussion/the point at issue
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
to fill a job vacancy/to fill in a blank (e.g. on questionnaire or exam paper)
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
